Description of incident: A hacker was able to access the computer system Smartphone Experts used to process online payments on June 13.  Customer names, addresses, credit and debit card account numbers, CVV codes, and payment card experiation dates were accessed.  The credit card information was encrypted, but the hacker may have used a decryption feature within the online payment processing system to access customer information.UPDATE (09/06/2013): The breach occurred on June 13.  This entry originally listed it as having occurred on July 12.
